scripts.apidocs:build: cd api-docs gem install bundler && bundle install && bundle exec rake build
scripts.apidocs:setup: git submodule init && git submodule update && cd api-docs && rvm install 2.3.0 && gem install bundle && bundle install
scripts.build: npm run apidocs:build && npm run synapse:build && npm run devcenter:build
scripts.setup: npm run apidocs:setup && npm run synapse:setup && gem install bundler && bundle install && npm install
scripts.start: npm run apidocs:build && npm run synapse:build && npm run devcenter:build && npm run server:start
scripts.synapse:setup: git submodule init && git submodule update && cd synapse && npm ci
